game

Class Container

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.GameObject
      • game.EnvironmentObject
        • game.Container
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Container
extends EnvironmentObject
implements java.io.Serializable
    An environment object that can hold items inside somewhat like the players inventory.
    Author:
    Celdamar
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
